t:
I woke up hearing footsteps on the stairs. I called out, “Who's there?” When there was no reply, I went down to investigate myself, but couldn't find anyone.



As I started walking back up,
I heard my voice from my bedroom,
                      “Who's there?”
c:
I quickly ran down trying to find a place to hide. Suddenly another me called me to come and hide with them in the bathroom.



#intruder #investigate #voice #alone #timetravel #scifi #loop
#spookiansclub
